column2: The heads of many men and heroes are bloody tokens of this character's valiance in combat.
The life of this warrior is legendary, his exploits match those of the mythic warriors of old.

Your fallen enemy lies before you, he was a valiant foe and his head will make a great trophy to prove your valor to the gods. Grasping your blade firmly, you severe his head from the rest of his body.

Some men say that you are 9 feet tall, shoot lightning from your eyes and wield a sword the size of a tree, one story even says that you fart huge fireballs from your arse. Now these are just stories, but they pay witness to the legend your life has become.
My legend will be greater than any other mans!
